name: Cardiac Surgery
detail: Cardiovascular surgery, also referred to as cardiac surgery or heart surgery, describes any surgical procedure that involves the heart.

name: Dental Services
detail: From family dentistry to specialty care like braces and dental implants, we offer a complete line of dental services to care for your overall oral health.

name: Health Check
detail: Preventive Health Check-up; Screening Tests; Full body Check-up. Regular health check-up can find problems before they start.

name: Psycho Therapy
detail: Psychotherapy is a general term for treating mental health problems by talking with a psychiatrist, psychologist.

name: Ambulance Car
detail: An ambulance is a medically equipped vehicle which transports patients to treatment facilities, such as hospitals.

name: Skin Care
detail: Clean your face no more than twice a day, or just once, if you have dry skin and don't wear makeup.
